name: My Kingdom for some Quartz
description:
You are a robot in this short adventure who is sent on a time traveling mission, but something goes wrong. You have to find a way home.

There are two endings in this game. Can you find both?

My first game ever. Made in Bitsy Game Maker for 48 Secret Jam - February 2018. The theme was Robots and Kingdoms. 

Tools used:

  • Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Le Doux
  • Bosca Ceoil by Terry Cavanagh
  • bitsy-dialog-exit-room.js by mildmojo
